Uses of Package
org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable

Packages that use org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable
org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable Die package offers classes which are used for an ascii-based tabluar output. 
 

Classes in org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable used by org.perfidix.ouput.asciitable
AbstractTabularComponent
          This abstract class represents all drawable items in this NiceTable.
AbstractTabularComponent.Alignment
          Alignment in the cells.
NiceTable
          This class represents a table which allows formatting of data as an ascii table.
